name: lmp-superapp
description: Monorepo: Backend + Frontend User + Frontend Admin

scripts.dev: concurrently -n backend,user,admin -c blue,magenta,green "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:user" "npm run dev:admin"
scripts.build: echo 'Build started for monorepo root' && npm run build --workspace=frontend-user && npm run build --workspace=frontend-admin
